message.name: ERR_SEARCH_MANDATORY_MISSING
message.locale: Reference or partial Name criteria are required.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_PROVINCE
message.locale: Province, State or Territory field must contain at least 2 alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_POSTALCODE
message.locale: Postal or Zip Code field must contain at least 3 alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_PO_RESIDENTIAL
message.locale: PO Box/Rural Route/General Delivery field must contain at least 2 alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_CITY
message.locale: City, Town or Village field must contain at least 2 alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_STREET_NUMBER_OR_STREET_ONE
message.locale: Street Number or Street 1 field must contain at least 2 alphanumeric character.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_STREET_NAME_OR_STREET_TWO
message.locale: Street Name or Street 2 field must contain at least 2 alphanumeric characters.

message.name: ERR_EXT_PARTY_NAME_COUNTRY_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: 'External Party Name' country entered already exists

message.name: ERR_DATE_OF_ENTRY_INTO_FORCE_CAN_NOT_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Date of Entry into Force' must remain blank if 'Status of Agreement' is 'Not in Force'.

message.name: ERR_DATE_OF_REVISED_AGREEMENT_MUST_BE_AFTER_DATE_OF_ENTRY_INTO_FORCE
message.locale: 'Date of Revised Agreement' must be after 'Date of Entry into Force'.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_MUST_BE_AFTER_DATE_OF_ENTRY_INTO_FORCE
message.locale: 'End Date' must be after 'Date of Entry into Force'.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_MUST_BE_AFTER_THE_DATE_OF_REVISED_AGREEMENT
message.locale: 'End Date' must be after 'Date of Revised Agreement'.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_MUST_BE_AFTER_QUBEC_START_DATE
message.locale: 'End Date' must be after the 'Entry with Quebec (QC) Start Date'.

message.name: ERR_QUBEC_START_DATE_CAN_NOT_BE_EMPTY_IF_QUBEC_END_DATE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Entry with Quebec (QC) Start Date' cannot be empty if 'Entry with Quebec (QC) End Date' is entered.

message.name: ERR_QUBEC_END_DATE_MUST_BE_AFTER_THE_QUBEC_START_DATE
message.locale: 'Entry with Quebec (QC) End Date' must be after 'Entry with Quebec (QC) Start Date'.

message.name: ERR_TOTALIZATION_WITH_THIRD_COUNTRY_CAN_NOT_BE_YES
message.locale: 'Totalization with 3rd Country' cannot be 'Yes'.

message.name: ERR_TOTALIZATION_WITH_THIRD_COUNTRY_CAN_NOT_BE_BLANK
message.locale: 'Totalization with 3rd Country' cannot be blank.

message.name: ERR_CANADA_CAN_NOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_A_FOREIGN_COUNTRY
message.locale: Canada cannot be selected as a Foreign Country.

message.name: ERR_CENTER_OF_SPCLZN_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Centre of Specialization (COS)' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_TOTALIZATION_WITH_3RD_CNTRY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Totalization with 3rd Country' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_STATUS_OF_AGREEMENT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Status of Agreement' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROTECTIVE_DATE_WITH_CNTRY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Is Protective Date associated with this Country' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SSA_LINK_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'SSA link' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SECURITY_SSA_COUNTRY_EXT_PARTY_CREATE
message.locale: You do not have 'SSA Country' external party creation rights. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_EXT_PARTY_NAME_DOES_NOT_MATCH_WITH_SELCTD_CNTRY
message.locale: 'External Party Name' does not match 'Country' selected.

message.name: ERR_EXT_PARTY_OFFICE_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: Foreign Office with that name already exists.

message.name: ERR_EXT_PARTY_OFFICE_ADDRESS_EXISTS
message.locale: Address for Foreign Office already exists.

message.name: ERR_EXT_PARTY_OFFICE_ADDRESS_COUNTRY_CANADA_NOT_ALLOWED
message.locale: Canada cannot be selected as a Foreign Country.

message.name: ERR_EXT_PARTY_OFFICE_APP_LINK_EXISTS
message.locale: This Foreign Office cannot be deleted. FECs, Liaisons or Foreign Applications are linked to this office.

message.name: ERR_EXT_PARTY_OFFICE_ADDRESS_COUNTRY_EXISTS
message.locale: Country selected does not match the SSA Country.
